author: Pamela Muse
text:
The City of Wheat Ridge, CO is looking to implement a Multi-Family Home Inspection program.  As the first step in that process we are soliciting information from Municipalities that already have a program in place.  We hope this information will help us create a program that fits the needs of our community.
Please complete the questionnaire attached (or pass along to the appropriate staff) and return to me at:
Nathan Mosley
Management Analyst
303-235-2867
nmosley@ci.wheatridge.co.us
title: Multi-Family Home Inspection Program
